title.rendered: How to Land Higher-Paying Clients: A 7-Step Framework to Grow Your Agency

content.rendered:
[vc_row el_class=”overflow” css=”.vc_custom_1574281597568{margin-bottom: 3% !important;padding-top: 40px !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-7 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1504895160519{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

Want to grow your digital agency? Start by finding higher-paying clients.

[vc_column_text el_class=”list-unstyled list-chevron”]What if a year from now, your new clients spent twice as much as your average client today? It’s possible… if you can get sales meetings with higher-paying prospects.

If you want to go down that road—sell to bigger companies, to land higher-paying clients—here’s a seven-step framework to make it happen, from agency expert Karl Sakas.[/vc_column_text]

Karl Sakas

Agency Advisor
Sakas and Company

Agency consultant Karl Sakas helps agency leaders “calm the chaos” of running their business through consulting, coaching, and training. Clients benefit from Karl’s agency operations background and experience in digital marketing since the days of dialup. His clients call him their “agency therapist.” When he’s not advising agencies worldwide, Karl volunteers as a bartender on an antique train. Learn more at SakasAndCompany.com.read more...

[vc_row_inner disable_element=”yes” el_class=”xm-hide” css=”.vc_custom_1562845575080{padding-top: 20px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_separator color=”green” align=”align_left” border_width=”3″ el_width=”50″][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1523913504382{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}”]”Personalized content and marketing automation are two major pillars of lead generation, which is why we collaborated with SharpSpring to share valuable strategies for digital marketers.” – Claire Berge, Director of Marketing at Brandpoint[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”158563″ img_size=”full” alignment=”right”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ el_class=”m-t-minus-25-percent” offset=”vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_id=”sticky-mobile-button”][vc_column]
